resources.name: [concat(parameters('factoryName'), '/Customer table data from SQL and CustomerAddress data from CSV the result where customer id 1000  Customer id 2000 in ascending order')]

properties.description: This pipeline will copy objects from one group. The objects belonging to this group will be copied parallelly.

activities.name: ListObjectsFromOneGroup
activities.description: List objects from one group and iterate each of them to downstream activities

activities.name: RouteJobsBasedOnLoadingBehavior
activities.description: Check the loading behavior for each object if it requires full load or incremental load. If it is Default or FullLoad case, do full load. If it is DeltaLoad case, do incremental load.

activities.name: FullLoadOneObject
activities.description: Take a full snapshot on this object and copy it to the destination

activities.name: GetMaxWatermarkValue
activities.description: Query the source object to get the max value from watermark column

activities.name: DeltaLoadOneObject
activities.description: Copy the changed data only from last time via comparing the value in watermark column to identify changes.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from [@{json(item().SourceObjectSettings).schema}].[@{json(item().SourceObjectSettings).table}] 
    where [@{json(item().DataLoadingBehaviorSettings).watermarkColumnName}] > @{if(contains(json(item().DataLoadingBehaviorSettings).watermarkColumnType, 'Int'),
    json(item().DataLoadingBehaviorSettings).watermarkColumnStartValue, 
    concat('''', json(item().DataLoadingBehaviorSettings).watermarkColumnStartValue, ''''))}
    and [@{json(item().DataLoadingBehaviorSettings).watermarkColumnName}] <= @{if(contains(json(item().DataLoadingBehaviorSettings).watermarkColumnType, 'Int'),
    activity('GetMaxWatermarkValue').output.firstRow.CurrentMaxWaterMarkColumnValue, 
    concat('''', activity('GetMaxWatermarkValue').output.firstRow.CurrentMaxWaterMarkColumnValue, ''''))}

defaultActivities.name: DefaultFullLoadOneObject
defaultActivities.description: Take a full snapshot on this object and copy it to the destination

properties.description: This pipeline will copy one batch of objects. The objects belonging to this batch will be copied parallelly.

activities.name: DivideOneBatchIntoMultipleGroups
activities.description: Divide objects from single batch into multiple sub parallel groups to avoid reaching the output limit of lookup activity.

activities.name: GetObjectsPerGroupToCopy
activities.description: Get objects (tables etc.) from control table required to be copied in this group. The order of objects to be copied following the TaskId in control table (ORDER BY [TaskId] DESC).

activities.name: CopyObjectsInOneGroup
activities.description: Execute another pipeline to copy objects from one group. The objects belonging to this group will be copied parallelly.

properties.description: This pipeline will count the total number of objects (tables etc.) required to be copied in this run, come up with the number of sequential batches based on the max allowed concurrent copy task, and then execute another pipeline to copy different batches sequentially.

activities.name: GetSumOfObjectsToCopy
activities.description: Count the total number of objects (tables etc.) required to be copied in this run.

sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT count(*) as count FROM @{pipeline().parameters.MainControlTableName} where TopLevelPipelineName='@{pipeline().Pipeline}' and TriggerName like '%@{pipeline().TriggerName}%' and CopyEnabled = 1

activities.name: CopyBatchesOfObjectsSequentially
activities.description: Come up with the number of sequential batches based on the max allowed concurrent copy tasks, and then execute another pipeline to copy different batches sequentially.

activities.name: CopyObjectsInOneBatch
activities.description: Execute another pipeline to copy one batch of objects. The objects belonging to this batch will be copied parallelly.

items.value: @createArray('select * from [SalesLT].[Product] where productid>100','select * from [SalesLT].[Customer] where customerid>100 and customerid<1000')

resources.name: [concat(parameters('factoryName'), '/check if cust id exist in table then update it')]
[concat(parameters('factoryName'), '/highest listPrice of any product under each productcategory')]

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from [SalesLT].[Customer] where modifieddate>'@{activity('check date from HWM').output.firstRow.HwDateTime}' and modifieddate<='@{activity('check last run from customer').output.firstRow.lastdate}'

update [dbo].[HighWaterMark] set HwDateTime='@{activity('check last run from customer').output.firstRow.lastdate}';
SELECT * FROM [dbo].[HighWaterMark];

resources.name: [concat(parameters('factoryName'), '/remove the duplicate record available in the CSV file and save it as JSON')]

scriptLines: {ID            Name                        Age              Salary               Country        } as string
source1 derive(id = substring({ID            Name                        Age              Salary               Country        }, 1, 2),
name = substring({ID            Name                        Age              Salary               Country        }, 15, 27),
age = substring({ID            Name                        Age              Salary               Country        }, 42, 3),
salary = substring({ID            Name                        Age              Salary               Country        },60,6),
country = substring({ID            Name                        Age              Salary               Country        }, 81, 9)) ~> derivedColumn1
